text: Kid Blue is a 1973 American western movie directed by James Frawley and starring Dennis Hopper, Warren Oates, Peter Boyle, Ben Johnson, M. Emmet Walsh. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox ==Other websites== * Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:1973 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Kid Blue
